attributes.action: Partially devolve HM Treasury functions to the level of the individual
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Removal of centralised HM Treasury jurisdiction over allocation of taxation & a degree of self-autonomy for individuals of how taxation is spent in their area. 

A starting figure of 0.5% (increased each year if successful) of an individual's tax to be allocated as they wish. 
Syndicates formed to pay for larger items

• Tax will be more willingly paid & therefore yield increased 

• People feel they are making a recognizable & realised contribution to where they live 

• Companies / Individuals may structure tax liability to increase locally collected taxes rather than (inter)national taxes to aid their locality. Investment more immediately & business can help to improve areas through this investment. 

• National Treasury can focus on national picture of expenditure to bolster areas where further investment is needed therefore encourage a whole scale sustainable programme.

• Cost saving on HM Revenue & Customs enforcement if tax if paid willingly

• People will care more about local elections
